correlationKey.description: the correlation key of the message

deadline.description: the unix timestamp in milliseconds until when the message can be correlated. If the deadline is exceeded then the message expires and will be removed. If this property is not set, it returns -1 instead.

messageId.description: The ID of a message is an optional field which is used to make messages unique and prevent publishing the same message twice during its lifetime.

timeToLive.description: the time to live of the message

variables.description: the variables of this record. Can be empty.
